analyzed: bka' yis rgyas btab lus ni rnal 'byor gter yin phyi rol 'gro ma yin/_/de

analyzed: yi dus su yid kyi g.yo ba med 'gyur rlung gi rab tu 'bab pa chad/_/ma sgribs

original: kyi gsung ngo /_/
analyzed: kyi gsung ngo /_/
translated: This is the speech of the Buddha.

original: ji srid 'od gsal ngo bo ma shar bsil ba'i 'od zer gyi ni rgyun gyi rdzas/_/
analyzed: ji srid 'od gsal ngo bo ma shar bsil ba'i 'od zer gyi ni rgyun gyi rdzas/_/

analyzed: lha mo'i pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i khongs su ro mnyam gyur pa rgyal ba'i tshhogs rnams kyis//

original: spro byed rdo rje'i rtshe mo'i drung du snying rje yis ni dbyer med 'gro byed pa/_/de srid
analyzed: spro byed rdo rje'i rtshe mo'i drung du snying rje yis ni dbyer med 'gro byed pa/_/de srid

original: khyab bdag gzugs ni dpal ldan snying rje'i stobs kyis lhan skyes shes par gyis/_/
analyzed: khyab bdag gzugs ni dpal ldan snying rje'i stobs kyis lhan skyes shes par gyis/_/

original: dge ba'i mgon po'i 'o/_/
analyzed: dge ba'i mgon po'i 'o/_/
translated: This is the verse of Kalyāṇamitra.🔽For as long as the wind of the moon that melts the three vajras in the vajra jewel🔽remains in the inner chamber, the place of the joined lotus, at that moment

original: ji srid rdo rje nor bur rdo rje gsum bsregs ltung ba'i zla ba'i rlung gis ni/_/
analyzed: ji srid rdo rje nor bur rdo rje gsum bsregs ltung ba'i zla ba'i rlung gis ni/_/
translated: the innate consciousness, which is free from the concepts of self and other and so on,🔽is the supreme reasoning and is clear from the scriptures.🔽This is the verse of Virūpa.🔽The innate consciousness, which is free from the concepts of self and other and so on,🔽is the supreme reasoning and is clear from the scriptures.🔽This is the verse of Virūpa.🔽The innate consciousness, which is free from the concepts of self and other and so on,🔽is the supreme reasoning and is clear from the scriptures.

analyzed: gnas pa chu skyes kha sbyor gnas can nang gi khang bur thim pa'i skad cig der/_/

analyzed: gang zhig 'byung dang rang gzhan la sogs rtog bral tha snyad kyis dman bdag
translated: is the supreme reasoning and is clear from the scriptures.🔽This is the verse of Virūpa.🔽The innate consciousness, which is free from the concepts of self and other and so on,🔽is the supreme reasoning and is clear from the scriptures.🔽This is the verse of Virūpa.

analyzed: yid kyis/_/shes pa'i lhan skyes de nyid gang phyir rigs pa mchog dang lung las
translated: The innate consciousness, which is free from the concepts of self and other and so on,🔽is the supreme reasoning and is clear from the scriptures.

original: gsal ba yin/_/bi ru wa yi'o/_/
analyzed: gsal ba yin/_/bi ru wa yi'o/_/
translated: This is the verse of Virūpa.🔽The innate consciousness, which is free from the concepts of self and other and so on,🔽is the supreme reasoning and is clear from the scriptures.🔽This is the verse of Virūpa.🔽The innate consciousness, which is free from the concepts of self and other and so on,🔽is the supreme reasoning and is clear from the scriptures.🔽This is the verse of Virūpa.🔽The innate consciousness, which is free from the concepts of self and other and so on,

analyzed: yangs par kun du song ba'i sems kyi yid skye dang bcas dga' thob dal bu yis//

analyzed: ji srid g.yo med ma thob yun ring de srid du ni de bzhin yang dag gnas/_/
translated: As long as one does not attain stability, one abides in the same way.

analyzed: kun phan byed pa rab tu 'byung ldan skar ma'i bdag po'i snang bar mi 'dor ro/_/

original: b+hu su ku'i 'o/_/
analyzed: b+hu su ku'i 'o/_/
translated: Of the Bhūsuku.

original: dga' ba gnyis po bcings pa'i rgyun du gyur pa rdo rje rtshe mo'i mtha' la🔽gnas/_/gnas nas rab 'pho thig le dkar po'i tshhogs kyis ji srid mkhas
analyzed: dga' ba gnyis po bcings pa'i rgyun du gyur pa rdo rje rtshe mo'i mtha' la gnas/_/gnas nas rab 'pho thig le dkar po'i tshhogs kyis ji srid mkhas
translated: The one who abides at the end of the vajra line, the continuous binding of the two joys,🔽from that place, the wise one meditates on this instant of bliss, the gathering of the white bindu,

original: pas 'dod pa yi/_/skad cig 'di ni chu skyes rgyas pa'i ze 'brur mkhas pa de🔽srid bsam gtan byed/_/kye ho de nyid mkhas pas shes kyi mchog ste 'di la
analyzed: pas 'dod pa yi/_/skad cig 'di ni chu skyes rgyas pa'i ze 'brur mkhas pa de srid bsam gtan byed/_/kye ho de nyid mkhas pas shes kyi mchog ste 'di la
translated: as long as desired, in the anthers of the blooming lotus.🔽O! That is the supreme wisdom of the wise, in which there is no confusion of the two.

original: gnyis su 'khrul pa med/_/nag po spyod pa'i 'o/_/
analyzed: gnyis su 'khrul pa med/_/nag po spyod pa'i 'o/_/

original: grub mtha' bdun pa bzhugs so//

analyzed: ji srid cung zad yid kyi rnam rtog rang 'byung spang bya yin te gang gi phyir/_/

analyzed: de srid dga' ba'i byed po gang 'di snying ni bde byed de yang kun rtog tsham/_/

analyzed: gang yang chags bral dngos po der rjes gnyis po gang de srid pa'i rgyu yi mchog_/

original: yul la rnam rtog bdag nyid sems las gzhan du mya ngan 'das pa 'gar yang🔽med/_/sa ra ha'i zhabs dang bar ma chad pa/_dpal klu sgrub zhabs kyis rgya

translated: Nirvana is nowhere else but in the mind, which is the imagination of objects.🔽This is the essence of the teachings of the glorious Nagarjuna,

analyzed: mtshho las phyung ba'o/_/ brjid bag dang bcas rdo rje nor bu 'khyil pa'i khang bu'i mthar/_/skyil

original: par byed/_/lag+ni chen mo'i 'o/_/
analyzed: par byed/_/lag+ni chen mo'i 'o/_/
translated: In the jewel cave, which is a swirl of vajras and jewels,🔽the mind, with great bliss,
